body_html:
This looks like you failed to initialize some of the variables in your model?

It seems like the uninitialized variable is a LOCAL_VARIABLE created here

I think this requires you to call tf.initialize_all_variables() and tf.initialize_local_variables() (see #1045)

@wicke Is there somebody who can comment on usage of this op?
body_text:
This looks like you failed to initialize some of the variables in your model?
It seems like the uninitialized variable is a LOCAL_VARIABLE created here
I think this requires you to call tf.initialize_all_variables() and tf.initialize_local_variables()   (see #1045)
@wicke  Is there somebody who can comment on usage of this op?
body:
This looks like you failed to initialize some of the variables in your model?

It seems like the uninitialized variable is a LOCAL_VARIABLE created [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/metrics/python/ops/metric_ops.py#L708)

I think this requires you to call tf.initialize_all_variables() and tf.initialize_local_variables()   (see #1045)

@wicke  Is there somebody who can comment on usage of this op?
